name: Cheese Quest 2
description:
Cheese Quest 1: https://vinny-does-gamez.itch.io/cheese-quest

OST: Coming soon...

Welcome to Cheese Quest 2, the sequel to the critically acclaimed Cheese Quest. 

You play as Terry, and you are going on a nice relaxing vacation to the Cheeselandian Islands with your friends Chad, a guy who runs a prank channel on YouTube that is just completely awful, Steven, the guardian of the forest and  mysterious bird man, and Kid, a kid,... PHYCE!!! There's a giant monster that you need to defeat! You also meet Aleki, the only inhabitant of a now abandoned town. You can listen to great songs such as Abandoned Town, Plastic, Plastic V2, and What Am I Doing With My Life.

I originally made this for a school project in like, four days, so it's  bit short so I added a secret area and boss to try and add some content. A bit of a warning, if you manage to find the secret area it will severely over level you.
